keys: marco de aceleración de la referencia

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120219</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120219</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Primerjava gibanja v pospešenih opazovalnih sistemih</string>
            <string language="en">Compare Motion in Accelerating Frames. 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergleichen Sie Bewegung in beschleunigenfeldern. 
1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comparez le mouvement dans les trames 
d'accélération. 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compare o movimento em frames de aceleração. 
1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Confronti il movimento nei telai accelerare. 
1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συγκρίνετε την κίνηση στην επιτάχυνση των πλαισίων. 
1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Compare el movimiento en marcos de aceleración. 
1</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Demonstracija spremembe kinetične energije in gibalne količine pri trku dveh kroglic v pospešenem opazovalnem sistemu.</string>
            <string language="en">Demonstration of change of kinetic energy and momentum in case of collision between two balls in accelerated reference frame.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pospešeni opazovalni sistem</string>
            <string language="en">accelerating reference frame</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">opazovalni sistem</string>
            <string language="en">reference frame</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Demonstration der Änderung der kinetischen 
Energie und des Momentums falls vom Zusammenstoß zwischen zwei Kugeln
in beschleunigtem Bezugsfeld.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Démonstration de changement d'énergie et d'élan
cinétiques en cas de collision entre deux boules dans la trame 
accélérée de référence.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demonstração da mudança da energia e do 
momentum cinéticos caso que de uma colisão entre duas esferas no 
frame acelerado da referência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dimostrazione di cambiamento di energia e di 
quantità di moto cinetiche nel caso dello scontro fra due sfere nel 
telaio accelerato di riferimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδειξη της αλλαγής της κινητικής ενέργειας και της 
ορμής σε περίπτωση σύγκρουσης μεταξύ δύο σφαιρών στο 
επιταχυνόμενο πλαίσιο αναφοράς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Demostración del cambio de la energía y del 
ímpetu cinéticos en caso de que de la colisión entre dos bolas en 
marco acelerado de la referencia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">beschleunigenbezugsfeld</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bezugsfeld</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">trame d'accélération de référence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">trame de référence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">frame de aceleração da referência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">frame da referência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">struttura accelerare di riferimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">struttura di riferimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επιταχύνοντας πλαίσιο αναφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πλαίσιο αναφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">marco de aceleración de la referencia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">marco de la referencia</string>
          </keyword>
